testcase.classname: Feature to perform a web automation task
testcase.name: Verify that user is able to update First name on MyAccount Page
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user enters Automation Practice Demo website URL........................passed When user clicks on Sign in tab.............................................passed And user enters email address and password for a registered user............passed And user clicks on Sign in button...........................................passed Then user is redirected to MyAccount Page...................................passed And user clicks on My Personal Information button...........................passed When user enters new value for First name field.............................passed And user enters the current password and clicks on save button..............passed Then success message is recieved............................................passed And browser is closed.......................................................passed
